Companion: Hey @, I've got free time today!#$q 575/576 emilyCompanion_followup#Want to go find something fun to do?#$r 575 10 emilyCompanion_yes#Absolutely! I have some cool things to show you too!#$r 576 0 emilyCompanion_no#I'm sorry, but today's actually bad for me.
emilyCompanion_yes: I knew I could count on you for a good time! Lead the way.$h
emilyCompanion_no: No worries. I'm off on Sundays so let me know if you're free next week!
emilyCompanion_followup: #$p 575 #So thanks for coming with me! There's so many beautiful things to see around here.|I'm working nearly every night so I know it's hard to find time to take a break.
CompanionActions: Hey @, what's up? #$q 500/501 CompanionFollowup#What's up?#$r 500 0 CompanionActionEnd#That's all the time I have to hang out today.#$r 501 0 CompanionActionContinue#Nothing, just taking a breather.
CompanionActionEnd: Alright, well thanks for hanging out with me today!$h
CompanionAutomaticDismissal: Hey @, I'd love to stay with you a little longer but I do need to be getting home at a reasonable hour.$u#$b#I had such a great time though! Come find me on my next day off and we'll do this again.$0
companionBeach: I love the feeling of sand on my feet! It's like a thousand tiny gems all glittering on me.$h
companionSubmarine: It's very sobering to be down here. Just thinking that all life on land came from down here originally...$u
companionDesert: Hey, let's go see Sandy while we're here! I love getting to catch up with her$h
companionClub: Have you met Mr. Qi? He seems mysterious, like he knows something great and terrible about humanity that we don't.$u
companionSkullCave: These monsters may be strong, but we'll be safe with our powers combined.$7
companionSewer: Can you imagine a world where we allowed all the Jojas of the world to do whatever they wanted?#$b#With the damage to the environment, I imagine we'd see a lot more places looking like this.$s
companionBugLand: It feels like something extremely dark was once, or still is, down here.$6
companionArchaeologyHouse: @! Look at all the beautiful gems here! They're so amazing!
companionTunnel: It feels so dark, and empty down here. Like we might be the only living things here...$u
companionWizardHouse: I admire Rasmodius. It seems like he has a deep respect for all kinds of life.
companionWitchHut: I wonder what drove this poor woman to be like she is. Most people don't want to be evil, you know.$u
companionAdventureGuild: It's sad that humans and elementals can't learn to co-exist. We wouldn't need weapons like these.$u
companionMine: Let's look for powerful gems while we're down here, @!$h#$e#Let me know if you see any Amethyest. I'd love you forever if you found some!$h
companionRailroad: I used to love walking down railroad tracks when I was a kid.#$b#Actually, I guess I still love it!$h
companionBathHouse_Pool: I need to come here more often. It really take the stress of work out of my bones.
companionWoods: What a gorgeous forest. It's hard to believe this place even exists sometimes.#$b#I'm glad I'm here with you.$l#$e#Wait, you don't think there are any bears in here, do you?$6
